description: A user representing the interests of an account.

custID.description: The ID of the customer associated with this account.

wholesalerID.description: The ID of the wholesaler responsible for fulfilling the account's orders.

deliveryAddresses.description: The addresses associated with this account. Note: in some regions, it is more convenient to model multiple places of businesses as multiple account objects. In others, it may be preferable to encapsulate this data in a single account object with multiple delivery addresses. This relationship provides that flexibility.

minimumCaseOrderRequirement.description: The minimum number of cases or the total case equivalency an account must purchase when placing an order.

totalCredit.description: The total credit extended to an account.

creditBalance.description: The current credit remaining on an account.

creditExpiration.description: The date the account's credit will expire. Preferred format: yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.

paymentMethods.description: An enumerated list of payment methods available to the account.

orderDeadlines.description: The time at which an order must be placed on a given day for it to be processed by the following morning.

day.description: Day of the week, enumerated. Sunday = 0, Saturday = 6.

time.description: The time of the order deadline in the format HH:mm:ss

administrators.description: The administrators of this account. Note: these users do not appear in the users relationship.

users.description: The users associated with this account. Note: administrators do not appear in this array.
